channel.title: One last fix to finish
channel.description: Hi once again I got one more fix I need help with. My edgeville shopkeeper won't allow sell of items. But all the other shops do. Someone said something about itemvar might be wrong but I'm not sure if that's the problem since it worked when I first put this online.

item.title: One last fix to finish
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

syn acid:

Your first suggestion make’s since, but your second one does not. It used to work selling items, now for no reason it won’t. I’ve added “custom” gear they sell/buy just fine. But still won’t show your inventory when edge falador and every other shop sells all inventory just fine. Also each time I try to add bows and runes it says the bind is already in use… When clearly it’s not being sold somewhere.

I am failing to understand what you mean, if you can explain again I might be able to help you.

Read full topic

Hi once again I got one more fix I need help with. My edgeville shopkeeper won’t allow sell of items. But all the other shops do. Someone said something about itemvar might be wrong but I’m not sure if that’s the problem since it worked when I first put this online.
